channel.title: Speakers on elm-conf 2016
channel.description: Recent content in Speakers on elm-conf 2016

item.title: Evan Czaplicki - Creator of Elm
item.description: Evan created Elm, a functional language for web programming. He is an open source engineer at NoRedInk, where all front-end code is written in Elm these days. He continues to develop the language, tools, and libraries full time.
